price: Whoever comes to his Lord as an evildoer, for him is Hell; he will neither die therein nor live[19].
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَأۡتِ رَبَّهُۥ مُجۡرِمٗا فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ
footnotes: [19] He will neither die to relax from punishment, nor live a pleasant life.
